backend/main.mo: Defines a canister exposing a transform query and a helper that performs HTTP GET requests via http-outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping feature IDs to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of each frontend file for reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the main React module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the TemperatureDashboardPage.
frontend/src/components/TemperatureChart: Recharts-based temperature chart rendering filtered and CSV series with solid and dashed red lines and customized legend/tooltip.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages authenticated or anonymous canister actor creation and invalidates dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and related auth state logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module reserved for future backend query hooks.
React Query hook fetching temperature data with 10‑second refresh and tracking last-updated time.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines updated Tailwind base variables using a clean white theme with olive accents and shared chart colors.
frontend/src/lib/temperatureDataSource.t: Fetches raw temperature JSON from the Google Apps Script endpoint and parses it into typed data points.
frontend/src/lib/temperatureParsing.ts: Parses raw temperature data and timestamps, normalizing numeric formats and filtering invalid points before sorting chronologically.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/TemperatureDashboardP: Renders the temperature dashboard with loading, error, refresh controls, and a time‑series temperature chart using fetched data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues related to temperature‑data visualization features.
